Name: Free road
About the game: Isometric puzzle game                             Info This is a puzzle game, where you need to pave the way for a car. To put the road, you must select the desired one and drag it to the empty block. To remove the road, you need to tap on it. At the moment, the game has 45 levels. More levels coming soon! Features 45 Levels Isometric graphics
